\w Again|strong="G1208"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2532"\w* – ‘Hallelujah!’ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G1519"\w* ruins rises \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G1519"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ever|strong="G1519"\w*.

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* – ‘Praise \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* serve \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w You|strong="G3004"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* worship \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* low.’

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* heard \w what|strong="G3588"\w* seemed \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* shout \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* vast \w throng|strong="G3793"\w*, \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sound|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sound|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w loud|strong="G2478"\w* \w peals|strong="G1027"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w thunder|strong="G1027"\w*, \w crying|strong="G3793"\w* – ‘Hallelujah! \w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w*, \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*.

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w Beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* captured, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w taken|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w false|strong="G5578"\w* \w prophet|strong="G5578"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w performed|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* marvels \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* eyes \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* brand \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w worshiped|strong="G4352"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w*. \w Alive|strong="G2198"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* thrown, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w lake|strong="G3041"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* – \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w burning|strong="G2545"\w* \w sulfur|strong="G2303"\w*.
